atk-abh03a15:1_0: 301. Idāni satipaṭṭhānakathā hoti. “Tattha – catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ
atk-abh03a15:1_1: samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṁ kāyādayo
atk-abh03a15:1_2: satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a15:1_3: andhakānaṁ. Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā, siddhatthikāti ime
atk-abh03a15:1_4: pacchā uppannanikāyā. Tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_5: Tattha yasmā “patiṭṭhāti etesūti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti
atk-abh03a15:1_6: iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā. “Patiṭṭhahantīti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhahanti?
atk-abh03a15:1_7: Satiyo. Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā. Tasmā
atk-abh03a15:1_8: dvepi vādā pariyāyena yujjanti. Ye pana taṁ pariyāyaṁ pahāya ekanteneva “sabbe dhammā
atk-abh03a15:1_9: satipaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_10: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṁ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a15:1_11: Tattha khayagāmītiādīni maggavisesanāni. Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ
atk-abh03a15:1_12: gacchatīti khayagāmī. Cattāri saccāni bujjhanto gacchatīti bodhagāmī. Vaṭṭaṁ apacinanto
atk-abh03a15:1_13: gacchatīti apacayagāmī. Evametehi padehi “kiṁ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano
atk-abh03a15:1_14: maggo hotī”ti pucchati. Anāsavā asaṁyojaniyātiādīnipi lokuttarabhāvaṁ pucchanatthāya
atk-abh03a15:2_1: sativasena paṭikkhepo, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññāti. Evaṁ sabbapañhesu attho veditabbo.
